properties.label: JSON Properties

block.name: search_entries
block.description: Search entries in CICD | LT | Migrate Environment Properties lookup table

extended_input_schema.hint: Provide one or more entry fields to search the entry
extended_input_schema.label: Search by
extended_input_schema.name: parameters

extended_input_schema.hint: Set the initial items in the list. Defaults to an empty list if not supplied.
extended_input_schema.label: Items
extended_input_schema.name: list_items

extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To clear the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.
extended_input_schema.label: JSON Properties
extended_input_schema.name: json_properties

text_input.label: Properties JSON
text_input.hint: Please enter JSON string for properties. Eg., [{"key":"sample_key","value":"sample_value"}]

action_submit.title: Submit
action_submit.params: command: migrate_properties param1: process_data replace_message: true
